data.name: Construct VR - The Volumetric Movie Demo
data.detailed_description:
This Demo is a short introduction to PresenZ our Volumetric Movie Format powered by V-Nova compression.
You will be able to experience the immersion comfort and quality of PresenZ and compare it to "standrad" 360 movies.
And then you will enjoy some sample scenes showing different environments in PresenZ.
data.about_the_game:
This Demo is a short introduction to PresenZ our Volumetric Movie Format powered by V-Nova compression.
You will be able to experience the immersion comfort and quality of PresenZ and compare it to "standrad" 360 movies.
And then you will enjoy some sample scenes showing different environments in PresenZ.
data.short_description: An introduction to PresenZ our Volumetric Movie Format powered by V-Nova compression.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 & 11
  • Processor: Intel 6 cores 2.9 GHz base clock
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080, RTX 2060 Super, RTX 3060, no AMD cards supported
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SATA III or NVME SSD and minimal RAM speed of 2993GHz
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
